svg.aria-label: Pox Virus Illumina Amplicon Half-Genome workflow diagram
svg.title: Pox Virus Illumina Amplicon Workflow (Half-Genomes)
svg.desc: Pipeline for pox virus genomes sequenced as half-genomes in a tiled-amplicon approach: dual-pool fastp trimming, reference masking per pool, BWA-MEM alignment, pool merging, ivar primer trimming, ivar consensus, and MultiQC reporting.
